item.g:title: Ballon Bleu De Cartier
item.g:description: Ballon Bleu de Cartier watch, 28 mm, quartz movement. Steel case, fluted crown set with a synthetic cabochon-shaped spinel, silvered opaline dial, Roman numerals, blued-steel sword-shaped hands, sapphire crystal. Interchangeable steel bracelet. Case dimensions: diameter: 1. 1”, thickness: 0. 34”. Water-resistant up to 3 bar (approx. 30 meters/100 feet). MATERIALSteelCROWNBlueWATER RESISTANCE3 bar (~30 meters)GLASSSquare-shaped glassBACK MATERIAL TYPESteelCASE THICKNESS9. 35 mmWATCH FUNCTIONMinutesHoursWINDINGQuartzHANDS SHAPESwordsHANDS COLOURBlueHANDS MATERIALAcier non-allié C60 1. 1221
